name: Firenze Leather Bag
description:
This is a medium sized handmade, hand knit leather bag. It has a magnetic buckle closure and magnetic snap closure.The body of the bag is 16x 26 inches fully lined in jersey strap is 26inch long 2 internal zip pockets 10x10 and 10x12 cellphone and wallet pocket 8x10.
The proceeds from this bag help support a group of artisans in Peru that we do fair trade projects with. They are paid a fair wage to help make these items and by purchasing items that are fair trade it makes it possible to return back and do more projects with them again and again! please check out our featured country part of the site to see more about these projects and get in touch to be involved with these projects!

name: NEW leather wallets
description: A smaller version of the original Lana bag, only this time for the simple necessities... fits mobile phones, ipods, makeup , and just a few items for a night out or a day at the beach. description: These are one of a kind reversible leg and hand warmers... they will keep you warm and dry on those wet winer days... great for use with boots as they have stir ups on the bottom to keep them from riding up when you put your shoes on... they are one size fits all and come in a wide variety of colors and knits... they make a wonderful gift for yourself and friends alike... only a limited supply available to buy them asap! they are fully machine washable and dryable in the dryer but 100% wool... makes them all that better!

name: recycled bike tire belt
description:
A hand woven unisex delight and made from 95% recycled bike tires making it good for the environment and stylish at the same time!

Features include:
Constructed from RECYCLED bicycle inner tubes
Available for waists 22” – 50”
Belt height 40”
available in fat or skinny buckles
also comes in silver, gold, & bronze buckles please specify when ordering which color buckle and which size~

Adult Sizing:
XS - 22-24 in.
S - 24-30 in.
M - 30-36 in.
L - 36-40 in.
XL - 40-46 in.
XXL - 46-50 in.

These belts stretch so they fit all people, big or small, man or women~

name: hand crochet fingerless gloves
description: These are hand crochet fingerless gloves. Made from whatever materials I have around, but mainly cashmere or alpaca! always 100% natural fiber materials. They are the perfect solution to trying to use your iphone and still keep your hands warm at the same time! Can be custom ordered in any color you could imagine! also available in long and short versions!

name: I used to be a plastic bag clutch
description:
This is a 98% recycled material hand knit clutch! It is made from recycled plastic bags that are collected from the city, the forest, the beach and generally the world! Plastic is a material that unfortunatly takes over 500 billion years for a plastic bag to break down. SO we might as well re purpose the material as much as we can because there are sure a lot of plastic bags out there!
It has a pop closure and is fully lined in jersey cotton.

name: oversized knit clutch/laptop bag
description: This is a hand knit oversized clutch. It will fit most laptops. It has a pop closure. It has internal padding and a zip pocket inside to help organize your papers. Can be ordered in leather as well please get in touch!

description:

name: 100% Hand Knit Alpaca hat
description:
These will delight you! one size fits all! available in a wide variety of stripes and solids colors as well!

some facts about alpaca...Alpaca (Vicugna pacos) is a domesticated species of South American camelid. It resembles a small llama in appearance.

Alpacas are kept in herds that graze on the level heights of the Andes of southern Peru, northern Bolivia, Ecuador, and northern Chile at an altitude of 3,500 m (11,500 ft) to 5,000 m (16,000 ft) above sea-level, throughout the year. Alpacas are considerably smaller than llamas, and unlike llamas, alpacas were not bred to be beasts of burden but were bred specifically for their fiber. Alpaca fiber is used for making knitted and woven items, much as wool is. ALpaca is great for those of you who are allergic to wool as it doesnt not itch, is a lot softer and will keep you super warm!

name: hand knit leather pillows
description:
hand-knit leather pillow 20x20
organic cotton backing 
w/fully removable w/zipper closure
can be custom ordered in any color

name: handprinted pillows
description: drawn from the shadow of plants and then hand silk screen printed on organic cotton... these pillows are available in many different sizes and shapes... the ones shown are rectangles 12x10 and also 20x20 square pillows available and star pillows please specify which one you would love!

name: hand knit fabric pillow
description: These are all 100 % hand-knit, with the outer cover totally removable and hand-washable. It is knit with recycled materials. The most comfortable pillow you will ever enjoy!!!

name: hand printed star pillow
description: hand silk screen printed star pillow filled with organic 100% eco-friendly corn filling. Please let us know what color ink you would like printed. It is printed on an ultra suede fabric.

name: hand quilted pillow
description: These are all hand quilted pillows.They are stuffed with an organic soy product. They can be custom ordered in any size or shape!

name: paper crane chain of 5
description: hand made paper cranes strung on a string to bring you good luck! The crane is a majestic bird which mates for life and is extremely loyal to its partner. The bird is strong, graceful and beautiful. Because of the great importance of the crane, the Japanese people feel that a person who folds 1,000 cranes will be granted his or her greatest wish.

name: eyeglass case/ pipe holder
description:
this a unique and versatile piece that is hand knit with recycled materials.It measures 7.5" tall and 3.5" wide It has a pop closure and can be used for many things from holding crochet hooks, pipes to eye glasses depending on the person! It can be custom ordered in any color just be sure to contact us.

name: wild crafted sage smudge sticks
description: We have gorgeous white sage bundles for sale that we grow in our own garden. White Sage is considered by many to be a great herb to use for all smudging and purification needs. These easy to use and durable white sage smudge sticks can last a long time, up to months, provided they are extinguished properly after use.

name: palo santo wood
description: (Burseara Graveolens) Palo Santo or "Holy Stick" is a natural wood aromatic incense used for centuries by the Incas and indigenous people of the Andes as a spiritual remedy for purifying and cleansing, as well as to get rid of evil spirits and misfortune. as well as for medicinal purposes. It has a fine citrus aroma with underlying notes of frankincense, its close relative. It is often used by shamans in sacred plant spirit ceremonies. Our Palo Santo is sustainably wild harvested from a reserve in peru and bolivia from naturally fallen trees and branches that lie dead for 4-10 yrs. before they are harvested. please enjoy this special wood!

name: laser etched palo santo wood
description: you choose what you would like engraved on our very special palo santo wood. Palo Santo wood (Burseara Graveolens)or "Holy Stick" is a natural wood aromatic incense used for centuries by the Incas and indigenous people of the Andes as a spiritual remedy for purifying and cleansing, as well as to get rid of evil spirits and misfortune. as well as for medicinal purposes. It has a fine citrus aroma with underlying notes of frankincense, its close relative. It is often used by shamans in sacred plant spirit ceremonies. Our Palo Santo is sustainably wild harvested from a reserve in the amazon jungle of Peru and Bolivia from naturally fallen trees and branches that lie dead for 4-10 yrs. before they are harvested.  We have some ideas listed below of what you can have etched, but it is really up to you in the end.

name: medium zip wallet
description: This is a totally hand embroidered totally gorgeous and one of  kind wallet. The fabric comes from guatemala. It has a 4 " zipper closure. It measures 4"x4"  and it is fully lined.

name: eco friendly felted clutch
description:
This handmade clutch is made with a felt that is re-purposed from recycled plastic bottles. It is 12 inch wide by 5 inch tall. The motifs on the clutches are made with sacred symbols as the design. here are the choices...
om: the mother of mantras, Om is the primordial sound by which earth was created, the past, present and future are all included in this one infinite sound.

Lotus: sacred symbol in the Hindu, Buddhist, and Egyptian traditions. It rises from the sludge of muddy pools to blossom into purity and spiritual awakening.

The Flower of life: This symbol can still be seen at the temple of Osiris. The sacred geometry represents " the blueprint of all creation" and the " tree of life" 
Where these sacred symbol clutches with pride as they are very symbolic and full of energy and bless whoever possess them!

name: DIsplay box set Palo Santo Laser Etched Wood
description:
Great for a store display or for birthing ceremonies and new year celebrations!Great for gifting!

you choose what you would like engraved on our very special palo santo wood. Palo Santo wood (Burseara Graveolens)or "Holy Stick" is a natural wood aromatic incense used for centuries by the Incas and indigenous people of the Andes as a spiritual remedy for purifying and cleansing, as well as to get rid of evil spirits and misfortune. as well as for medicinal purposes. It has a fine citrus aroma with underlying notes of frankincense, its close relative. It is often used by shamans in sacred plant spirit ceremonies. Our Palo Santo is sustainably wild harvested from a reserve in the amazon jungle of Peru and Bolivia from naturally fallen trees and branches that lie dead for 4-10 yrs. before they are harvested. We have some ideas listed below of what you can have etched, but it is really up to you in the end.
